settings.autoScaleHint: If enabled, the module automatically calculates the ideal scale based on map width. The 'Scene Scale' slider then acts as a global multiplier.
settings.sceneScaleHint: The fixed scale for notes (if Auto-Scale is OFF) or a global multiplier (if Auto-Scale is ON).
settings.pinColorHint: Choose the color of the pin for notes. Selecting 'Random' will randomly assign a pin color. Select 'No Pins' to disable pin display.
settings.connectionLineWidthHint: The width (in pixels) of the connection lines between notes (default: 7).
settings.stickyNoteWidthHint: The width (in pixels) for all newly created sticky notes (default: 200).
settings.photoNoteWidthHint: The width (in pixels) for all newly created photo notes (default: 225).
settings.indexNoteWidthHint: The width (in pixels) for all newly created index cards (default: 600).
settings.handoutNoteWidthHint: The default width (in pixels) for newly created handout notes (default: 400).
settings.handoutNoteHeightHint: The default height (in pixels) for newly created handout notes (default: 400).
settings.baseFontSizeHint: The font size (in pixels) for text when the note width is at its default size (default: 16).
settings.fontHint: Choose the font to be used in notes.
settings.characterNameKeyHint: Specify the key path to retrieve the name (e.g., 'prototypeToken.name' or 'system.alias' for Blades in the Dark). If empty, defaults to 'name'.
settings.stickyNoteDefaultTextHint: The default text to use for new sticky notes.
settings.photoNoteDefaultTextHint: The default text to use for new photo notes.
settings.indexNoteDefaultTextHint: The default text to use for new index notes.
settings.mediaNoteDefaultTextHint: The default text to use for new media notes.
settings.baseCharacterLimitsHint: The base character limits for each font and note type. Edit this JSON to customize.
settings.showSetupWarningHint: Whether to show the setup warning for GMs about player permissions.
settings.defaultNoteColorHint: The default color for newly created sticky notes.
settings.defaultInkColorHint: The default ink color for text on newly created notes.

html.toAllowAllPlayers: To allow all players to fully use the Investigation Board, consider updating World Permissions in Game Settings >> User Management >> Configure Permissions.
html.toAllowPlayersToMove: To allow players to move, edit, and connect notes, you only need to enable Use Drawing Tools. This permission is harmless as it only affects canvas drawings and does not grant access to your server files.
html.securityNote: Security Note: Enabling file permissions gives players access to your server's file system through the File Picker.
html.noAudioFile: No audio file linked to this note.
html.noObjectLinked: No object linked. Drag and drop here to link.
